attributes.action: Create a road users charter, to refund a proportion of road tax if stuck in traffic jams due to poor infrastructure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The road network in this country is poor.  If there is an accident its perfectly normal for major roads to be closed for 4-5 hours while the relevant departments crawl into life and get the roads cleared.  Someone should be held accountable for this.  If the government had to pay out some sort of compensation to affected motorists then maybe we'd see accidents cleared and roads reopened more quickly.
